1.name: Celestial Radiance Ring
1.description: A luxurious ring inspired by the stars, perfect for special occasions. Crafted with premium materials to create a stunning piece that captures light beautifully.
1.features: Available in white gold, yellow gold, and rose gold. Set with brilliant-cut diamonds for exceptional sparkle. Comes in a premium gift box with certificate of authenticity.
1.caption: A luxurious ring inspired by the stars, perfect for special occasions.

2.name: Golden Serenity Necklace
2.description: Elegant gold necklace that brings serenity and grace to your outfit. Designed to complement both casual and formal attire with its timeless aesthetic.
2.features: Crafted in 18k gold with a secure lobster clasp. Adjustable chain length for versatile styling. Hypoallergenic material suitable for sensitive skin.
2.caption: Elegant gold necklace that brings serenity and grace to your outfit.

3.name: Royal Heirloom Earrings
3.description: Exquisite handcrafted earrings with intricate gemstone detailing, perfect for special occasions.
3.caption: A touch of royalty for your collection.

4.description: Elegant earrings crafted with precision, featuring sparkling diamonds and a timeless design.

5.name: Majestic Ring
5.description: An elegant ring crafted with intricate details and a touch of regal charm.

7.name: Celestial Golden Necklace
7.description: A radiant necklace with golden hues, inspired by the cosmos and crafted to perfection.
